item.description:
Fun with Alcohol Memorial Day Celebration! Bring your friends!!

Please come enjoy a large selection of draught beers and sweet potato fries on the outdoor beer garden. If you are able to get there as early as 5:30PM, please help me grab some tables. Late comers are welcome to join at any time, but please be aware that there will be standing room only after 6PM. We will be there until 8:30PM or so.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell number to attendees 24 hour before. I look like my photo and so should you.
item.why: It's Friday and many people will be leaving work early for the holiday weekend!
item.name: "OBAMA DRINKS A GUINNESS!!"
